file.name: Contentful-SCIMAPI.openapi_collection.yml
file.content:
openapi: 3.0.0
info:
  title: SCIM API
  description:  >-
    System for Cross-domain Identity Management, or SCIM, is an API specification created to facilitate the management of people and groups of people in cloud-based applications and services.
    
    
    Contentful's SCIM API is built on top of the SCIM 2.0 specification and can be integrated with major Identity Providers like Okta and OneLogin. It is possible to use our SCIM API to programatically create and manage organization memberships and teams within your Contentful organization.
    
    
    To learn more about our SCIM support and to see the full list of supported Identity Providers, visit our FAQs.
  version: 1.0.0
externalDocs:
  url: https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/scim-api/
servers:
  - url: https://api.contentful.com/scim/v2/organizations/{org_id}
components:
  securitySchemes:
    bearerAuth:
      type: http
      scheme: bearer
tags:
  - name: User
  - name: Users
  - name: Group
  - name: Groups
paths:
  /Users/{userId}:
    get:
      tags:
        - User
      summary: Get a single user
      description: >-
        https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/content-management-api/#/reference/locales/locale
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/scim+json
        - name: userId
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
          description: ID of the SCIM User
          example: 1xGZIRXr2WPnsLkKfREo0z
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json: {}
    put:
      tags:
        - User
      summary: Update a single user with PUT
      description: >-
        https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/content-management-api/#/reference/locales/locale
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              example:
                schemas:
                  - urn:ietf:params:scim:schemas:core:2.0:User
                id: 1xGZIRXr2WPnsLkKfREo0z
                meta:
                  resourceType: User
                  created: '2018-05-11T20:04:37Z'
                  lastModified: '2019-05-11T20:04:37Z'
                  location: >-
                    https://api.contentful.com/organizations/7BslKh9TdKGOK41VmLDjFZ/scim/v2/Users/1xGZIRXr2WPnsLkKfREo0z
                userName: user@example.com
                name:
                  givenName: Kasia
                  familyName: Kowalska
                active: true
                emails:
                  - value: user@example.com
                    type: work
                    primary: true
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/scim+json
        - name: userId
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
          description: ID of the SCIM User
          example: 1xGZIRXr2WPnsLkKfREo0z
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json: {}
    patch:
      tags:
        - User
      summary: Update a single user with PATCH
      description: >-
        https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/content-management-api/#/reference/locales/locale
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              example:
                schemas:
                  - urn:ietf:params:scim:api:messages:2.0:PatchOp
                Operations: []
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/scim+json
        - name: userId
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
          description: ID of the SCIM User
          example: 1xGZIRXr2WPnsLkKfREo0z
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json: {}
    delete:
      tags:
        - User
      summary: Delete a single user
      description: >-
        https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/content-management-api/#/reference/locales/locale
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/scim+json
        - name: userId
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
          description: ID of the SCIM User
          example: 1xGZIRXr2WPnsLkKfREo0z
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json: {}
  /Users/:
    post:
      tags:
        - Users
      summary: Create a user
      description: >-
        https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/content-management-api/#/reference/locales/locale
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              example:
                schemas:
                  - urn:ietf:params:scim:schemas:core:2.0:User
                userName: user@example.com
                name:
                  givenName: Kasia
                  familyName: Kowalska
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/scim+json
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json: {}
    get:
      tags:
        - Users
      summary: Get all users in the organization
      description: >-
        https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/content-management-api/#/reference/locales/locale
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/scim+json
        - name: filter
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          example: userName eq "someone@example.com"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json: {}
   
  /Groups/{groupId}:
    get:
      tags:
        - Group
      summary: Get a single group
      description: >-
        https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/content-management-api/#/reference/locales/locale
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/scim+json
        - name: groupId
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
          description: ID of the Contentful team
          example: <group_id>
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json: {}
    patch:
      tags:
        - Group
      summary: Update a single group
      description: >-
        https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/content-management-api/#/reference/locales/locale
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              example:
                schemas:
                  - urn:ietf:params:scim:api:messages:2.0:PatchOp
                Operations:
                  - op: replace
                    path: displayName
                    value: My Group
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/scim+json
        - name: groupId
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
          description: ID of the Contentful team
          example: <group_id>
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json: {}
    delete:
      tags:
        - Group
      summary: Delete a single group
      description: >-
        https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/content-management-api/#/reference/locales/locale
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/scim+json
        - name: groupId
          in: path
          schema:
            type: string
          required: true
          description: ID of the Contentful team
          example: <group_id>
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json: {}
  /Groups:
    post:
      tags:
        - Groups
      summary: Create a group
      description: >-
        https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/content-management-api/#/reference/locales/locale
      requestBody:
        content:
          application/json:
            schema:
              type: object
              example:
                schemas:
                  - urn:ietf:params:scim:schemas:core:2.0:Group
                displayName: My Group
                members:
                  - value: '123'
                    display: Kasia Kowalska
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/scim+json
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json: {}
    get:
      tags:
        - Groups
      summary: Get all groups in the organization
      description: >-
        https://www.contentful.com/developers/docs/references/content-management-api/#/reference/locales/locale
      security:
        - bearerAuth: []
      parameters:
        - name: Content-Type
          in: header
          schema:
            type: string
          example: application/scim+json
        - name: filter
          in: query
          schema:
            type: string
          example: displayName eq "My Group"
      responses:
        '200':
          description: Successful response
          content:
            application/json: {}

Error: parse: parse spec: parse servers: at 1:8168: path parameter not specified: "org_id"
